channel.title: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) on Chengyu Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) on Chengyu Zhang

item.title: BFS - Breadth First Search
item.description: A way to explore trees, graphs, or grids one level at a time.

item.title: Prefix Product
item.description: A powerful technique for efficiently computing product-related queries.

item.title: Prefix Sum
item.description: A powerful technique for efficiently computing sum-related queries.

item.title: Counter in Python
item.description: A special dictionary-like class for counting occurrences of elements

item.title: Sliding Window
item.description: Sliding Window, an efficient technique for solving array problems

item.title: Merge Sort
item.description: A reliable and efficient algorithm for sorting data using a divide-and-conquer approach.

item.title: Two Pointers
item.description: A simple and adaptable technique that optimizes problem-solving by scanning arrays efficiently

item.title: Binary Search
item.description: A fast and precise method for finding targets in sorted arrays.
